text: Bharyamar Sookshikkuka () is a 1968 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. S. Sethumadhavan. ==Cast== * Prem Nazir as Suresh * Sheela as Shobha * Adoor Bhasi as S. R. Pothuval * Ammini as Madhavi Amma * Kamalam as Mala Sinha * Sankaradi as Devadas * T. R. Omana as Devaki Amma * K. P.
